docs.snippet: The current economic boom in Brazil is "fantastic" in its size and scope and yet the signs are unmistakable that the country is on its way to an economic stability which may tend to consolidate the present commercial gains throughout the post-war...
docs.lead_paragraph: The current economic boom in Brazil is "fantastic" in its size and scope and yet the signs are unmistakable that the country is on its way to an economic stability which may tend to consolidate the present commercial gains throughout the post-war period, Daniel A. del Rio, assistant to the vice president of the Central Hanover Bank and Trust Company, declared yesterday.

headline.main: LONG-TERM UPTURN FORECAST IN BRAZIL; Del Rio Sees the Current Boom Developing Into Post-War Economic Stability OTHER LATIN NATIONS GAIN Export Managers Are Told U.S. Policies and Buying Are Proving Their Value LONG-TERM UPTURN FORECAST IN BRAZIL

docs.snippet: In view of British and American proposals now under consideration for stabilization of currencies in the post-war period, prompt clarification of immediate trade problems and commercial relations between the two governments is essential, foreign...
docs.lead_paragraph: In view of British and American proposals now under consideration for stabilization of currencies in the post-war period, prompt clarification of immediate trade problems and commercial relations between the two governments is essential, foreign traders asserted last week.

docs.snippet: The scope of the Pan-American Conference of Women scheduled for Wednesday afternoon at the New York Times Hall, was widened yesterday with the announcement of the participation of a representative from Canada. Mrs. F.B. Cutter, president of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The scope of the Pan-American Conference of Women scheduled for Wednesday afternoon at the New York Times Hall, was widened yesterday with the announcement of the participation of a representative from Canada. Mrs. F.B. Cutter, president of the Canadian Women's Club of New York City, will be among the speakers.
docs.abstract: plans; Mrs F B Cutter to represent Canada

headline.main: CANADIAN TO SPEAK AT WOMEN'S RALLY; Still Another Country to Be Represented at Pan-American Conference on Wednesday

docs.snippet: The Canadian free dollar was irregularly lower last week. After early values of 90.32 cents, a slight bulge in the offerings caused a recession to 90.06 cents, on Friday, with a rally to 90.12 cents, the close on Saturday, for a loss of 1-16 cent...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Canadian free dollar was irregularly lower last week. After early values of 90.32 cents, a slight bulge in the offerings caused a recession to 90.06 cents, on Friday, with a rally to 90.12 cents, the close on Saturday, for a loss of 1-16 cent from the preceding week.
